original: 徐州琅琊人，蜀漢官員，諸葛瑾、諸葛亮之弟。因蜀漢未設史官，幾無其人生平記載，僅知其隨諸葛亮之後仕於劉備，官至長水校尉。
text: A native of Langya, Xuzhou, an official of the Han Dynasty, the younger brother of Zhuge Jin and Zhuge Liang. Because there was no official historian in the Shu Han Dynasty, there is almost no record of his life. It is only known that he served in Liu Bei after Zhuge Liang, and became an official to Changshui.
